original_title: 羞恥　新入生　発育健康診断　2021～初夏～ 2枚組スペシャル
overview: "The teacher told me that if I got one more point, I could get a recommendation from the university. When I talked about it at home, my dad and mom were overjoyed and took me to yakiniku to celebrate. I went to school this morning. When I went there, I was told, "I'm going to have a medical examination, though it's sudden." Only I seem to go in class. What on earth are you going to do? I was reminded by the teacher that if I listened carefully to the doctor's story and came along properly, the recommendation of the school I wanted to go to would be guaranteed ... There was a friend from the next class at the venue. I was a little relieved, but the boys who always looked at me in gym clothes with nasty eyes were being injected with their hips turned over in front of me. Will we do this too? There is absolutely no such thing as sexual harassment, right? "
title: New Student Development Health Examination 2021 – Early Summer – 2-disc Special
